title: Armour/Lowest bonuses

properties.name: description
properties.value: This page lists the items with the lowest specific bonuses for each slot.

content:
See also: Armour/Highest bonuses

This page lists the items with the lowest specific bonuses for each slot.

Contents

      • 1.1.1 Stab
      • 1.1.2 Slash
      • 1.1.3 Crush
      • 1.1.4 Magic

    • 1.2 Defence bonuses

Members[edit | edit source]

Attack bonuses[edit | edit source]

Stab[edit | edit source]

Slot Image Item Stab bonus Notes
Spined helm -6 Requires 40 , 40 , and completion of The Fremennik Trials
Berserker necklace -10
Armadyl chestplate -7 Requires 70 and to wear.
Armadyl chainskirt -6 Requires 70 and to wear.
Flippers -2 Require 32 and completion of Skippy and the Mogres to obtain
Hard leather shield -15 Requires 20 and 10 to wield. All leather shields share the same negative attack bonuses.
Bronze mace +1 This weapon and the bronze scimitar provide the lowest usable stab bonus. While the Barrelchest anchor has a -2 stab bonus, it requires 2 hands and thus cannot be used in conjunction with leather shields.
Flowers, Rubber chicken, Mouse toy -100 Although these weapons give the lowest possible stab bonus, the stab attack style cannot be used while wielding them.
TOTAL -143 The usable bonus is -42.

Slash[edit | edit source]

Slot Image Item Slash bonus Notes
Spined helm -6 Requires 40 , 40 , and completion of The Fremennik Trials.
Berserker necklace -10
Armadyl chestplate -7 Requires 70 and to wear.
Armadyl chainskirt -6 Requires 70 and to wear.
Flippers -2 Require 32 and completion of Skippy and the Mogres to obtain
Hard leather shield -15 Requires 20 and 10 to wield. All leather shields share the same negative attack bonuses.
Bronze dagger +2 This weapon provides the lowest usable slash bonus.
Flowers, Rubber chicken, Mouse toy -100 Although these weapons give the lowest possible slash bonus, the slash attack style cannot be used while wielding them.
TOTAL -143 The usable bonus is -41.

Crush[edit | edit source]

Slot Image Item Crush bonus Notes
Spined helm -6 Requires 40 , 40 , and completion of The Fremennik Trials.
Berserker necklace -10
Armadyl chestplate -7 Requires 70 and to wear.
Armadyl chainskirt -6 Requires 70 and to wear.
Flippers -2 Require 32 and completion of Skippy and the Mogres to obtain
Odium ward -12 Requires 60 to wield.
Any fun weapon -50
TOTAL -93

Magic[edit | edit source]

Slot Image Item Magic bonus Notes
Robin hood hat -10 Requires 40 to wear.
Fighter torso, Justiciar chestguard -40 Requires 40 to wear and is awarded from the Barbarian Assault minigame. The justiciar chestguard requires 75 to wear.
Granite legs, Justiciar legguards -31 Requires 50 and to wear. Justiciar legguards require 75 to wear.
Pegasian boots -12 Requires 75 and 75 to wear.
Toktz-ket-xil, Granite shield -12 The toktz-ket-xil requires a minimum of 60 to wear, whereas the granite shield requires 50 and .
Ferocious gloves -16 Requires 80 and 80 to wear.
Lucky cutlass, Harry's cutlass -5 The lucky cutlass requires 30 , whereas Harry's cutlass only requires 20 . Both require the completion of Cabin Fever.
TOTAL -126 -64 is required for Splashing.

Ranged[edit | edit source]

Slot Image Item Ranged bonus Notes
Fighter hat, Granite helm -7 The fighter hat requires 45 and is awarded from the Barbarian Assault minigame, whereas the granite helm requires 50 and .
Justiciar chestguard -20
Granite legs -18 Requires 50 and to wear.
Moonclan boots -5 Requires completion of Lunar Diplomacy.
Moonclan cape -2 Requires completion of Lunar Diplomacy.
Malediction ward -12 Requires 60 to wield.
Ferocious gloves -16 Requires 80 and 80 to wear.
Bronze dart 0 Any type of dart will provide the lowest usable ranged bonus.
Sanguinesti staff -4 Despite having a -4 ranged attack bonus, the Sanguinesti staff cannot be used for ranged combat.
TOTAL -84 The usable bonus is -80.

Defence bonuses[edit | edit source]

Stab[edit | edit source]

Slot Image Item Stab bonus Notes
Berserker necklace -20
Dragon hasta -15 Requires 60 and Barbarian Training to wield.
Dragonfire ward -25 Requires shield to be uncharged.
TOTAL -60

Slash[edit | edit source]

Slot Image Item Slash bonus Notes
Berserker necklace -20
Dragon hasta -15 Requires 60 and Barbarian Training to wield.
Dragonfire ward -20 Requires shield to be uncharged.
TOTAL -55

Crush[edit | edit source]

Slot Image Item Crush bonus Notes
Berserker necklace -20
Dragon hasta -12 Requires 60 and Barbarian Training to wield.
Dragonfire ward -22 Requires shield to be uncharged.
TOTAL -54

Magic[edit | edit source]

Slot Image Item Magic bonus Notes
Justiciar faceguard -6 Requires 75 to wear.
Berserker necklace -20
Justiciar chestguard -16 Requires 75 to wear.
Justiciar legguards -14 Requires 75 to wear.
Spiked manacles -4
Dinh's bulwark -10 Requires 75 and 75 to wear.
Dragonstone gauntlets -4 Requires 40 to wear.
Granite ring (i) -4 Requires 50 to wear.
TOTAL -77

Ranged[edit | edit source]

Slot Image Item Ranged bonus Notes
Moonclan hat, Moonclan helm, Silly jester hat -5 Requires completion of Lunar Diplomacy. The silly jester hat requires partial completion of The fremennik isles.
Berserker necklace -20
Moonclan armour -10 Requires completion of Lunar Diplomacy.
Moonclan skirt -7 Requires completion of Lunar Diplomacy.
Moonclan boots, Silly jester boots -5 Requires completion of Lunar Diplomacy. Silly jester boots require partial completion of The fremennik isles.
Moonclan cape -2 Requires completion of Lunar Diplomacy.
Ancient wyvern shield -55 Requires 75 and 70 to wield. -55 Ranged defence can only be achieved when the shield has no charges
Moonclan gloves -5 Requires completion of Lunar Diplomacy.
Dragon hasta -15 Requires 60 and Barbarian Training to wield.
TOTAL -124

Other bonuses[edit | edit source]

Strength[edit | edit source]

Slot Image Item Strength bonus Notes
Flowers, Rubber chicken, Mouse toy -10
Dragonfire ward -2
TOTAL -12

Prayer[edit | edit source]

Slot Image Item Prayer bonus Notes
Ancient staff -1 Requires 50 and 50 to be worn, along with completion of Desert Treasure.
TOTAL -1

Weight[edit | edit source]

Slot Image Item Weight (kg) Notes
Gold helmet 31.7 Requires partial completion of the quest Between a Rock... to wear
Seal of passage 4.5
Granite body 22 Requires 50 and 50 to wear
Granite legs 15 Requires 50 and 50 to wear
Bandos boots 6 Requires 65 to wear
Diving apparatus 10 Requires partial completion of Recipe for Disaster to wear
Spined gloves or Skeletal gloves 3
Granite ring 3 Requires 50 and 50 to wear
Barrelchest anchor 30 Requires 60 , 40 , and completion of The Great Brain Robbery
TOTAL 125.2

Free-to-play[edit | edit source]

Attack bonuses[edit | edit source]

Stab[edit | edit source]

Slot Image Item Stab bonus Notes
Bronze mace +1 This weapon and the bronze scimitar provide the lowest usable stab bonus.

Rubber chicken
Hunting knife 		-100 Although these weapons give the lowest possible stab bonus, the stab attack style cannot be used while wielding them.
TOTAL -100 The usable bonus is +1.

Slash[edit | edit source]

Slot Image Item Slash bonus Notes
Bronze dagger +2 This weapon provides the lowest usable slash bonus.

Rubber chicken
Hunting knife 		-100 Although these weapons give the lowest possible slash bonus, the slash attack style cannot be used while wielding them.
TOTAL -100 The usable bonus is +2.

Crush[edit | edit source]

Slot Image Item Crush bonus Notes

Rubber chicken
Hunting knife 		-50
TOTAL -50

Magic[edit | edit source]

Slot Image Item Magic bonus Notes
any full helmet -6 All full helms provide the same -6 penalty.
any platebody -30 All platebodies provide the same -30 penalty.
any platelegs or plateskirt -21 All platelegs and plateskirts provide the same -21 penalty.
Fancy boots or Fighting boots -3
any kiteshield -8 All kiteshields provide the same -8 penalty.
Green d'hide vambraces -10 Requires 40 to wear.
any warhammer -4 All warhammers provide the same -4 penalty.
TOTAL -82 -64 is needed for Splashing.

Ranged[edit | edit source]

Slot Image Item Ranged bonus Notes
any full helmet -2 All full helms provide the same -2 penalty.
any platebody -10 All platebodies provide the same -10 penalty.
any platelegs or plateskirt -7 All platelegs and plateskirts provide the same -7 penalty.
Fancy boots or Fighting boots -1
any kiteshield -2 All kiteshields provide the same -2 penalty.
Crossbow +6 This weapon has the lowest usable ranged bonus.
TOTAL -22 The usable bonus is -16.

Defence bonuses[edit | edit source]

Stab[edit | edit source]

There are currently no free-to-play items with a negative stab defence bonus.

Slash[edit | edit source]

There are currently no free-to-play items with a negative slash defence bonus.

Crush[edit | edit source]

There are currently no free-to-play items with a negative crush defence bonus.

Magic[edit | edit source]

Slot Image Item Magic bonus Notes
any full helmet or med helm -1 All metal helms provide the same -1 penalty.
any platebody -6 All platebodies provide the same -6 penalty.
any platelegs or plateskirt -4 All platelegs and plateskirts provide the same -4 penalty.
any kiteshield -1 All kiteshields provide the same -1 penalty.
TOTAL -12

Ranged[edit | edit source]

Slot Image Item Ranged bonus Notes
Any battleaxe or 2h sword -1
TOTAL -1

Strength[edit | edit source]

Slot Image Item Strength bonus Notes

Rubber chicken
Hunting knife 		-10
TOTAL -10

Prayer[edit | edit source]

There are currently no free-to-play items with a negative prayer bonus.

Weight[edit | edit source]

Slot Image Item Weight (kg) Notes
Adamant full helm 3.175 Requires 30 to wear.
Adamant platebody 11.339 Requires 30 to wear.
Adamant platelegs 10.432 Requires 30 to wear.
Gravedigger boots 2
Black cape 0.453 All capes available in F2P weigh 0.453 kg.
Adamant kiteshield 5.896 Requires 30 to wear.
Skeleton gloves 2.267
Crossbow 8
TOTAL 43.562
